roleset.name: laugh in a somewhat supressed manner
roleset.note: TITTER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls nonverbal_expression-40.2. Comparison to 'snigger.'Framed by Claire (from titter.01-v)

role.descr: cognate object, laugh itself when mentioned
end state of Arg0, result of snickering, into a tizzy, etc.

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: At this moment, the real murderer is probably tittering, but the world has clearly seen that any one of the regimes of Lebanese and Iraqi is more fragile than the other.

example.name: More Arguments
example.text: Mary tittered herself unconscious at John's accident.
